languages.text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову при вашем приближении. Уголки его губ приподнимаются в многообещающей улыбке.{/n} "Я и мое внимание твои, {name}".
{n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай склоняет голову при вашем приближении. Уголки его губ приподнимаются в многообещающей улыбке.{/n} "Я и мое внимание твои, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai baja la vista cuando te acercas. Las comisuras de su boca se elevan en una sonrisa prometedora.{/n} «Mi atención y yo somos tuyos, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai baja la vista cuando te acercas. Las comisuras de su boca se elevan en una sonrisa prometedora.{/n} «Mi atención y yo somos tuyos, {name}».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}当你靠近时，玛拉斋低下了头。他的嘴角上扬，露出了充满承诺意味的微笑。{/n}“我的身心都属于你，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你靠近时，玛拉斋低下了头。他的嘴角上扬，露出了充满承诺意味的微笑。{/n}“我的身心都属于你，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたが近づくと頭を下げた。彼の口角は上がっており、それは良いサインのように思えた。{/n}「話しを聞こう、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、あなたが近づくと頭を下げた。彼の口角は上がっており、それは良いサインのように思えた。{/n}「話しを聞こう、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai baisse la tête à votre approche, et les commissures de ses lèvres se courbent en un sourire lourd de promesses.{/n} « Je me tiens tout entier à votre disposition, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai baisse la tête à votre approche, et les commissures de ses lèvres se courbent en un sourire lourd de promesses.{/n} « Je me tiens tout entier à votre disposition, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai senkt den Kopf, als du dich näherst. Seine Mundwinkel heben sich zu einem Lächeln voller Versprechungen.{/n} "Ich und meine Aufmerksamkeit gehören Euch, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai senkt den Kopf, als du dich näherst. Seine Mundwinkel heben sich zu einem Lächeln voller Versprechungen.{/n} "Ich und meine Aufmerksamkeit gehören Euch, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, ."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, sen gelince başını eğiyor. Her türlü anlam çıkarılabilecek bir gülüş sergiliyor.{/n} "Dikkatim tamamen sende {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lowers his head at your approach. The corners of his mouth lift in a smile full of promises.{/n} "I and my attention are yours, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, sen gelince başını eğiyor. Her türlü anlam çıkarılabilecek bir gülüşü var.{/n} "Tamamen seni dinliyorum {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
